mapper.select: select s.price ,s.transaction_type,p.patent_name,s.patent_id,ss.patent_first_column_id,pt.patent_type_desc as patent_type_name from sell_patent_goods s join patents p on s.patent_id=p.patent_id join sell_second_column ss on s.patent_second_column=ss.patent_second_column_id join patent_types pt on p.patent_type=pt.patent_type_id where s.patent_second_column in( select patent_second_column_id from sell_second_column where patent_first_column_id = #{id});

select s.price ,p.patent_name,s.patent_id from sell_patent_goods s join patents p on s.patent_id=p.patent_id where s.patent_second_column in( select patent_second_column_id from sell_second_column where patent_first_column_id = #{id}) limit 0,9;

select s.price ,p.patent_name,s.patent_id,ss.patent_first_column_id from sell_patent_goods s join patents p on s.patent_id=p.patent_id join sell_second_column ss on s.patent_second_column=ss.patent_second_column_id where status=1 AND s.recommend_status=1 limit 0,9;

select s.price,s.patent_second_column,s.add_date,s.transaction_type,sc.patent_second_column_name,sc.patent_first_column_id,sf.patent_first_column_name,p.patent_status,ps.patent_status_desc,p.patent_name,p.app_no,p.app_person,p.app_date,p.patent_type,pt.patent_type_desc from sell_patent_goods s join patents p on s.patent_id=p.patent_id join patent_types pt on p.patent_type=pt.patent_type_id join sell_second_column sc on s.patent_second_column=sc.patent_second_column_id left join patent_status ps on p.patent_status=ps.patent_status_id join sell_first_column sf on sc.patent_first_column_id=sf.patent_first_column_id where s.patent_id= #{patent_id}
select s.price,s.add_date,s.transaction_type,p.patent_name,p.app_no from sell_patent_goods s join patents p on s.patent_id=p.patent_id where s.status=1
select patent_second_column_id, patent_second_column_name from sell_second_column where patent_first_column_id=#{i}
select count(*) from sell_patent_goods s where s.patent_second_column in( select patent_second_column_id from sell_second_column where patent_first_column_id = #{j});

select f.patent_first_column_id firstColumnId, f.patent_first_column_name firstColumnName,sc.count firstCount, s.patent_second_column_id secondColumnId, s.patent_second_column_name secondColumnName,scs.count secoundCount from sell_first_column f join sell_second_column s on f.patent_first_column_id = s.patent_first_column_id join sell_count sc on f.patent_first_column_id=sc.id join sell_count scs on s.patent_second_column_id = scs.id

SELECT up.patent_id,up.price,up.patent_name,up.app_no ,sc.patent_first_column_id FROM (SELECT sg.patent_id,sg.patent_second_column,sg.price,sg.status,sg.transaction_type,sg.add_date,sg.owner,p.patent_name,p.app_no FROM sell_patent_goods sg LEFT JOIN patents p ON sg.patent_id = p.patent_id limit #{page.startIndex}, #{page.pageSize}) up join sell_second_column sc on up.patent_second_column=sc.patent_second_column_id WHERE
up.app_no like #{keyword_pattern} or up.patent_name like #{keyword_pattern}

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT sg.patent_id,sg.price,sg.status,sg.transaction_type,sg.add_date,sg.owner,p.patent_name,p.app_no FROM sell_patent_goods sg LEFT JOIN patents p ON sg.patent_id = p.patent_id ) up WHERE
up.app_no like #{keyword_pattern} or up.patent_name like #{keyword_pattern}
SELECT notice_id,notice_name,zipfile_name FROM notices WHERE patent=#{patent_id}

SELECT p.patent_id, p.app_no,p.patent_name,pt.patent_type_desc as patent_type_name,s.price ,ss.patent_first_column_id,sf.patent_first_column_name FROM sell_patent_goods s JOIN patents p ON s.patent_id=p.patent_id left join patent_types pt ON p.patent_type = pt.patent_type_id JOIN sell_second_column ss ON s.patent_second_column=ss.patent_second_column_id JOIN sell_first_column sf ON ss.patent_first_column_id=sf.patent_first_column_id WHERE sf.patent_first_column_id=#{shopType} and s.status=1 limit #{page.startIndex}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM sell_patent_goods s JOIN patents p ON s.patent_id=p.patent_id left JOIN patent_types pt ON p.patent_type = pt.patent_type_id JOIN sell_second_column ss ON s.patent_second_column=ss.patent_second_column_id JOIN sell_first_column sf ON ss.patent_first_column_id=sf.patent_first_column_id WHERE sf.patent_first_column_id=#{shopType} and s.status=1
